question_text: We have a free weekend and ₹50,000. Where are we going?

options.text: A luxury resort doing absolutely nothing
An adventure trip (trekking/camping)
A staycation in a 5-star hotel in our city

question_text: It's Friday night. What's the ideal plan?

options.text: Netflix and homemade dinner
Going out to a new restaurant
Calling friends over for a game night

question_text: If we won ₹10 crores in the lottery, what's the FIRST thing we do?

options.text: Quit our jobs immediately
Buy a dream house
Invest most of it and live off the returns

question_text: What's more important in a relationship?

options.text: Having fun together
Being able to talk about anything
Supporting each other's goals

question_text: We have 2 hours free on Sunday morning. What are we doing?

options.text: Sleeping in and being lazy
Going for a walk or workout
Catching up on household chores

question_text: If we could live anywhere in the world, where would it be?

options.text: A big city with lots of opportunities
A peaceful small town or village
Near the beach or mountains

question_text: What's your ideal way to celebrate our anniversary?

options.text: A romantic dinner at a fancy restaurant
A weekend trip to somewhere new
A simple celebration at home with meaningful gifts

question_text: It's raining heavily outside. What sounds most appealing?

options.text: Hot chai and pakoras while watching the rain
Getting cozy under a blanket with a good movie
Playing board games or cards together

question_text: If you had to pick ONE superpower, which would it be?

options.text: Time travel
Mind reading
Teleportation

question_text: What's the best part of being together?

options.text: Never feeling alone
Always having someone who gets you
Growing and learning together
